long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Eichar extension immediately delivers info about who's from your Linkedin connections is looking for the job right now.
Once a person from your connections puts "open to work" function or says that is open to new opportunities - this extension will deliver this information right away. 

Be the first to find out who's looking for the job right now!
